title: Which is better, Andhra University or Lovely Professional University? - Quora

response.answer_text: Obviously Andhra, LPU is made by people who do business (lovely sweets, lovely auto etc). If you you are going to give your carrier on the hands of a businessman than you are idiot. LPU will treat you like animals. First two days of mess will be good but once you have paid money there food will not be good. They have security. But all the guards in security are idiots and sometimes they will beat as well. One of my friend was going to other hostle and he got caught by guards and they beat him badly.

Lpu is no way better than andhra university. Au is state public university the toppers join here and lpu is private university with only good infrastructure. The laboratories are excellent, professors at au are highly talented but these they are not attending classes properly. Infact u can see nirf ranking also
